account creation deletion modification reset or extension Acted as an escalation point for security problems not resolved by the IT Support Desk Conducted basic analysis to ensure that security on all platforms complies with published company procedures Conducted review of applicable system access reports and audit logs and files or reports problems accordingly Created and maintained information security systems and procedures documentation Created and published system reports for review by security auditing and compliance technical support and other staff Worked with other technical teams on security projects and system integrations Education Bachelor of Science in Education University of Lagos Lagos State 2008
